thread.title: Report: Rays sign outfielder Colby Rasmus
thread.title_full: Report: Rays sign outfielder Colby Rasmus

author: Daniel Goffenberg
title: Report: Rays sign outfielder Colby Rasmus
text:
January 9, 2017, 7:17 PM Daniel Goffenberg January 9, 2017, 7:17 PM 
Free agent outfielder Colby Rasmus has reportedly agreed to a deal with the Tampa Bay Rays . rasmus has a deal with rays. good fit, AL sources say. @Ken_Rosenthal said close 
â€” Jon Heyman (@JonHeyman) January 9, 2017 
Rasmus spent the past two seasons with the Houston Astros , managing a .223/.301/.419 slash line in 244 games. 
He was a Blue Jay for parts of four seasons, coming over in a trade from St. Louis in 2011. 
The left-handed hitting slugger has topped the 20-home run mark four times in his career, primarily playing in centre. 
He figures to move to a corner outfield position should he sign with Tampa, given the presence of reigning Gold Glove winner Kevin Kiermaier . %2Fbaseball%2Fmlb%2Freport-outfielder-colby-rasmus-rays-close-deal%2F
